pullRequest.title: HTTP header authentication realm
pullRequest.bodyText:
This implements the core functionality of the legacy SSO Plugin.
It offers the possibility to use a trusted HTTP header to login a user.

commit.message: Add HTTP endpoint to manage the HTTP header auth config
Create HTTPHeaderAuthConfigStore, HTTPHeaderAuthConfigActions and HTTPHeaderAuthConfig api routes
Create HTTP header auth config update form
Create HTTP header auth config details component
Redirect to authenticator details page after updating authenticator
